simple_desc: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.

title: Winnie the Pooh
simple_desc: While searching for honey, Pooh and his friends embark on an adventure to find Eeyore's missing tail and rescue Christopher Robin from an unknown monster called The Backson.

title: The Great Mouse Detective
simple_desc: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.

title: The Cat Returns
simple_desc: After helping a cat, a seventeen-year-old girl finds herself involuntarily engaged to a cat Prince in a magical world where her only hope of freedom lies with a dapper cat statuette come to life.

title: Balto
simple_desc: An outcast Husky risks his life with other sled dogs to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.

title: Fantasia 2000
simple_desc: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Gods
simple_desc: The Z-Fighters must contend with Lord Beerus, the God of Destruction, but only a God can fight a God, and none of them are Gods. However with the creation of the Super Saiyan God, will the Z-Fighters be able to defeat Lord Beerus?

title: Arthur Christmas
simple_desc: Santa's clumsy son Arthur sets out on a mission with Grandsanta to give out a present they misplaced to a young girl in less than two hours.

title: Turning Red
simple_desc: A 13-year-old girl named Meilin turns into a giant red panda whenever she gets too excited.

title: Hotel Transylvania
simple_desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter.

title: Ralph Breaks the Internet
simple_desc: Six years after the events of "Wreck-It Ralph," Ralph and Vanellope, now friends, discover a wi-fi router in their arcade, leading them into a new adventure.

title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
simple_desc: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

title: The Sea Beast
simple_desc: When a young girl stows away on the ship of a legendary sea monster hunter, they launch an epic journey into uncharted waters - and make history to boot.

title: Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers
simple_desc: Thirty years after their popular television show ended, chipmunks Chip and Dale live very different lives. When a cast member from the original series mysteriously disappears, the pair must reunite to save their friend.
A rag doll that awakens in a postapocalyptic future holds the key to humanity's salvation.

title: Ron's Gone Wrong
simple_desc: The story of Barney, an awkward middle-schooler and Ron, his new walking, talking, digitally-connected device. Ron's malfunctions set against the backdrop of the social media age launch them on a journey to learn about true friendship.

title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
simple_desc: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.

title: A Scanner Darkly
simple_desc: An undercover cop in a not-too-distant future becomes involved with a dangerous new drug and begins to lose his own identity as a result.

title: ParaNorman
simple_desc: A misunderstood boy takes on ghosts, zombies and grown-ups to save his town from a centuries-old curse.

title: Abominable
simple_desc: Three teenagers must help a Yeti return to his family while avoiding a wealthy man and a zoologist who want him for their own needs.

title: The Peanuts Movie
simple_desc: Snoopy embarks upon his greatest mission as he and his team take to the skies to pursue their archnemesis, while his best pal Charlie Brown begins his own epic quest back home to win the love of his life.

title: Rio
simple_desc: When Blu, a domesticated macaw from small-town Minnesota, meets the fiercely independent Jewel, he takes off on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with the bird of his dreams.

title: Madagascar
simple_desc: A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild.

title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
simple_desc: A young linguist named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.

title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
simple_desc: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know that things are about to take a turn for the worst.

title: The Croods: A New Age
simple_desc: The prehistoric family the Croods are challenged by a rival family the Bettermans, who claim to be better and more evolved.

title: A Goofy Movie
simple_desc: When Max makes a preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.

title: The Road to El Dorado
simple_desc: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.

title: The Rescuers
simple_desc: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.

title: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
simple_desc: When Sid's attempt to adopt three dinosaur eggs gets him abducted by their real mother to an underground lost world, his friends attempt to rescue him.

title: An American Tail
simple_desc: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.

title: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole
simple_desc: When a young owl is abducted by an evil Owl army, he must escape with new-found friends and seek the legendary Guardians to stop the menace.

title: Charlotte's Web
simple_desc: Wilbur is a farm pig who's terrified that he'll end up on the dinner table. His friend Charlotte, a charming spider, comes to his rescue. She weaves words into her web, convincing the farmer that Wilbur is too special a pig to kill.

title: Frankenweenie
simple_desc: When a boy's beloved dog passes away suddenly, he attempts to bring the animal back to life through a powerful science experiment.

title: The Lion King
simple_desc: After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: The Bad Guys
simple_desc: To avoid prison, a gang of notorious animal criminals pretends to seek being rehabilitated, only for their leader to realize that he genuinely wants to change his ways.

title: Frozen II
simple_desc: Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest of an enchanted land. They set out to find the origin of Elsa's powers in order to save their kingdom.

title: Bolt
simple_desc: The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real.

title: Horton Hears a Who!
simple_desc: Horton the Elephant struggles to protect a microscopic community from his neighbors who refuse to believe it exists.

title: Meet the Robinsons
simple_desc: Lewis is a brilliant inventor who meets mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson, whisking Lewis away in a time machine and together they team up to track down Bowler Hat Guy in a showdown that ends with an unexpected twist of fate.

title: Brother Bear
simple_desc: When a young Inuit hunter needlessly kills a bear, he is magically changed into a bear himself as punishment with a talkative cub being his only guide to changing back.

title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
simple_desc: The Madagascar animals join a struggling European circus to get back to New York, but find themselves being pursued by a psychotic animal-control officer.

title: Spies in Disguise
simple_desc: When the world's best spy is turned into a pigeon, he must rely on his nerdy tech officer to save the world.

title: Storks
simple_desc: Storks have moved on from delivering babies to packages. But when an order for a baby appears, the best delivery stork must scramble to fix the error by delivering the baby.

title: Mr. Peabody & Sherman
simple_desc: The time-travelling adventures of an advanced canine and his adopted son, as they endeavor to fix a time rift they created.

title: The Rescuers Down Under
simple_desc: R.A.S. agents Miss Bianca and Bernard race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
simple_desc: Manny, Sid and Diego discover that the ice age is coming to an end, and join everybody for a journey to higher ground. On the trip, they discover that Manny is not in fact the last of the woolly mammoths.

title: The Boxtrolls
simple_desc: A young orphaned boy raised by underground cave-dwelling trash collectors tries to save his friends from an evil exterminator.

title: A Christmas Carol
simple_desc: An animated retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel about a Victorian-era miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.

title: Beavis and Butt-Head Do America
simple_desc: Our intrepid adolescent heroes wake up to find their beloved television stolen, and embark on an epic journey across America to recover it, and, who knows, maybe even score.

title: DuckTales the Movie: Treasure of the Lost Lamp
simple_desc: Scrooge McDuck takes Huey, Dewey, and Louie to Egypt to find a pyramid and magic lamp.

title: Cars 3
simple_desc: Lightning McQueen sets out to prove to a new generation of racers that he's still the best race car in the world.

title: Over the Hedge
simple_desc: A scheming raccoon fools a mismatched family of forest creatures into helping him repay a debt of food, by invading the new suburban sprawl that popped up while they were hibernating...and learns a lesson about family himself.

title: Pocahontas
simple_desc: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth century Virginia.

title: The Good Dinosaur
simple_desc: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side-by-side, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend.

title: Ferdinand
simple_desc: After Ferdinand, a bull with a big heart, is mistaken for a dangerous beast, he is captured and torn from his home. Determined to return to his family, he rallies a misfit team on the ultimate adventure.

title: Vivo
simple_desc: Vivo, Sony Pictures Animation's first-ever musical adventure featuring all-new original songs from Lin-Manuel Miranda, will take audiences on an epic adventure to gorgeous and vibrant locations never before seen in animation.

title: Surf's Up
simple_desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.

title: All Dogs Go to Heaven
simple_desc: A canine angel, Charlie, sneaks back to earth from heaven but ends up befriending an orphan girl who can speak to animals. In the process, Charlie learns that friendship is the most heavenly gift of all.

title: James and the Giant Peach
simple_desc: An orphan who lives with his two cruel aunts befriends anthropomorphic bugs who live inside a giant peach, and they embark on a journey to New York City.

title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
simple_desc: The sailor of legend is framed by the goddess Eris for the theft of the Book of Peace and must travel to her realm at the end of the world to retrieve it and save the life of his childhood friend Prince Proteus.

title: Leap!
simple_desc: An orphan girl dreams of becoming a ballerina and flees her rural Brittany for Paris, where she passes for someone else and accedes to the position of pupil at the Grand Opera House.

title: Teen Titans GO! To the Movies
simple_desc: A villain's maniacal plan for world domination sidetracks five teenage superheroes who dream of Hollywood stardom.

title: Missing Link
simple_desc: Mr. Link recruits explorer Sir Lionel Frost to help find his long-lost relatives in the fabled valley of Shangri-La. Along with adventurer Adelina Fortnight, this trio of explorers travel the world to help their new friend.

title: The Pirates! Band of Misfits
simple_desc: Pirate Captain sets out on a mission to defeat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz for the Pirate of the year Award. The quest takes Captain and his crew from the shores of Blood Island to the foggy streets of Victorian London.

title: Kingsglaive: Final Fantasy XV
simple_desc: King Regis, who oversees the land of Lucis, commands his army of soldiers to protect the kingdom from the Niflheim empire's plans to steal the sacred crystal which gives Lucis its magic and power.

title: A Monster in Paris
simple_desc: A 3D-animated movie set in Paris in the year 1910 and centered on a monster who lives in a garden and his love for a beautiful, young singer.

title: Puss in Boots
simple_desc: An outlaw cat, his childhood egg-friend, and a seductive thief kitty set out in search for the eggs of the fabled Golden Goose to clear his name, restore his lost honor, and regain the trust of his mother and town.

title: Home
simple_desc: An alien on the run from his own people makes friends with a girl. He tries to help her on her quest, but can be an interference.

title: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
simple_desc: It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: Lego Duplo invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild.

title: Epic
simple_desc: A teenager finds herself transported to a deep forest setting where a battle between the forces of good and evil is taking place. She bands together with a ragtag group of characters to save their world--and ours.

title: Schindler's List
simple_desc: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: Goodfellas
simple_desc: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

title: The Pianist
simple_desc: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

title: The Intouchables
simple_desc: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

title: Hamilton
simple_desc: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

title: Amadeus
simple_desc: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was deeply jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

title: Sardar Udham
simple_desc: A biopic detailing the 2 decades that Punjabi Sikh revolutionary Udham Singh spent planning the assassination of the man responsible for the Jallianwala Bagh massacre.

title: Braveheart
simple_desc: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

title: Lawrence of Arabia
simple_desc: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

title: Dangal
simple_desc: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

title: Shershaah
simple_desc: Shershaah is the story of PVC awardee Indian soldier Capt. Vikram Batra, whose bravery and unflinching courage in chasing the Pakistani soldiers out of Indian territory contributed immensely in India finally winning the Kargil War in 1999.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
simple_desc: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: Green Book
simple_desc: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver for an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

title: A Beautiful Mind
simple_desc: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

title: Downfall
simple_desc: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

title: The Elephant Man
simple_desc: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

title: Dersu Uzala
simple_desc: The Russian army sends an explorer on an expedition to the snowy Siberian wilderness where he makes friends with a seasoned local hunter.

title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
simple_desc: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

title: Close-Up
simple_desc: The true story of Hossain Sabzian, a cinephile who impersonated the director Mohsen Makhmalbaf to convince a family they would star in his so-called new film.

title: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
simple_desc: The truth behind the ascension of Milkha Singh, who was scarred by of the India-Pakistan partition.

title: Paan Singh Tomar
simple_desc: The story of Paan Singh Tomar, an Indian athlete and seven-time national steeplechase champion who becomes one of the most feared dacoits in Chambal Valley after his retirement.

title: Hacksaw Ridge
simple_desc: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

title: Ford v Ferrari
simple_desc: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

title: Catch Me If You Can
simple_desc: Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

title: Into the Wild
simple_desc: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

title: Spotlight
simple_desc: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

title: The Sound of Music
simple_desc: A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.

title: Rush
simple_desc: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

title: 12 Years a Slave
simple_desc: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

title: Raging Bull
simple_desc: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

title: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
simple_desc: A college professor bonds with an abandoned dog he takes into his home.

title: Hotel Rwanda
simple_desc: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

title: In the Name of the Father
simple_desc: A man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

title: Inherit the Wind
simple_desc: Based on a real-life case in 1925, two great lawyers argue the case for and against a Tennessee science teacher accused of the crime of teaching evolution.

title: Andrei Rublev
simple_desc: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.

title: The Message
simple_desc: This epic historical drama chronicles the life and times of Prophet Muhammad and serves as an introduction to early Islamic history.

title: The Imitation Game
simple_desc: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians while attempting to come to terms with his troubled private life.

title: The Pursuit of Happyness
simple_desc: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

title: Dog Day Afternoon
simple_desc: Three amateur bank robbers plan to hold up a bank. A nice simple robbery: Walk in, take the money, and run. Unfortunately, the supposedly uncomplicated heist suddenly becomes a bizarre nightmare as everything that could go wrong does.

title: Ip Man
simple_desc: During the Japanese invasion of China, a wealthy martial artist is forced to leave his home when his city is occupied. With little means of providing for themselves, Ip Man and the remaining members of the city must find a way to survive.

title: The King's Speech
simple_desc: The story of King George VI, his unexpected ascension to the throne of the British Empire in 1936, and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch overcome his stammer.

title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
simple_desc: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.

title: Lion
simple_desc: A five-year-old Indian boy is adopted by an Australian couple after getting lost hundreds of kilometers from home. 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

title: Papillon
simple_desc: A French convict in the 1930s befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence in the South American penal colony on Devil's Island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

title: Cinderella Man
simple_desc: The story of James J. Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to challenge for the heavyweight championship of the world.

title: Gandhi
simple_desc: The life of the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.

title: Mirror
simple_desc: A dying man in his forties remembers his past. His childhood, his mother, the war, personal moments and things that tell of the recent history of all the Russian nation.

title: The Straight Story
simple_desc: An old man makes a long journey by lawnmower to mend his relationship with an ill brother.

title: The Sea Inside
simple_desc: The factual story of Spaniard Ramon Sampedro, who fought a 28-year campaign in favor of euthanasia and his own right to die.

title: Persepolis
simple_desc: A precocious and outspoken Iranian girl grows up during the Islamic Revolution.

title: The Diving Bell and the Butterfly
simple_desc: The true story of Elle editor Jean-Dominique Bauby who suffers a stroke and has to live with an almost totally paralyzed body; only his left eye isn't paralyzed.

title: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story
simple_desc: The untold story of Mahendra Singh Dhoni's journey from ticket collector to trophy collector - the world-cup-winning captain of the Indian Cricket Team.

title: Bohemian Rhapsody
simple_desc: The story of the legendary British rock band Queen and lead singer Freddie Mercury, leading up to their famous performance at Live Aid (1985).

title: Dallas Buyers Club
simple_desc: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.

title: Spartacus
simple_desc: The slave Spartacus survives brutal training as a gladiator and leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic, as the ambitious Crassus seeks to gain power by crushing the uprising.

title: Patton
simple_desc: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.

title: Togo
simple_desc: The story of Togo, the sled dog who led the 1925 serum run despite being considered too small and weak to lead such an intense race.

title: The Lion in Winter
simple_desc: 1183 A.D.: King Henry II's three sons all want to inherit the throne, but he won't commit to a choice. When he allows his imprisoned wife Eleanor of Aquitaine out for a Christmas visit, they all variously plot to force him into a decision.

title: In Cold Blood
simple_desc: Two ex-cons murder a family in a robbery attempt, before going on the run from the authorities. The police try to piece together the details of the murder in an attempt to track down the killers.

title: Super 30
simple_desc: Based on the life of Patna-based mathematician Anand Kumar who runs the famed Super 30 program for IIT aspirants in Patna.

title: Tombstone
simple_desc: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

title: The Irishman
simple_desc: An illustration of Frank Sheeran's life, from W.W.II veteran to hit-man for the Bufalino crime family and his alleged assassination of his close friend Jimmy Hoffa.

title: Hidden Figures
simple_desc: The story of a team of female African-American mathematicians who served a vital role in NASA during the early years of the U.S. space program.

title: The Big Short
simple_desc: In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the United States mortgage market. In their research, they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

title: The Social Network
simple_desc: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

title: American Gangster
simple_desc: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

title: Remember the Titans
simple_desc: The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.

title: Captain Phillips
simple_desc: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the U.S.-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

title: The Right Stuff
simple_desc: The U.S. space program's development from the breaking of the sound barrier to selection of the Mercury 7 astronauts, from a group of test pilots with a more seat-of-the-pants approach than the program's more cautious engineers preferred.

title: The Fighter
simple_desc: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

title: Awakenings
simple_desc: The victims of an encephalitis epidemic many years ago have been catatonic ever since, but now a new drug offers the prospect of reviving them.

title: Thirteen Lives
simple_desc: A rescue mission is assembled in Thailand where a group of young boys and their soccer coach are trapped in a system of underground caves that are flooding.

title: Glory
simple_desc: Robert Gould Shaw leads the U.S. Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices from both his own Union Army, and the Confederates.

title: Walk the Line
simple_desc: A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis, and Carl Perkins.

title: Straight Outta Compton
simple_desc: The rap group NWA emerges from the mean streets of Compton in Los Angeles, California, in the mid-1980s and revolutionizes Hip Hop culture with their music and tales about life in the hood.

title: The Insider
simple_desc: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a 60 Minutes exposé on Big Tobacco.

title: Pride
simple_desc: U.K. gay activists work to help miners during their lengthy strike of the National Union of Mineworkers in the summer of 1984.

title: October Sky
simple_desc: The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

title: Ed Wood
simple_desc: Ambitious but troubled movie director Edward D. Wood Jr. tries his best to fulfill his dreams despite his lack of talent.

title: Changeling
simple_desc: Grief-stricken mother Christine Collins takes on the L.A.P.D. to her own detriment when they try to pass off an obvious impostor as her missing child.

title: My Left Foot
simple_desc: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

title: The Killing Fields
simple_desc: A journalist is trapped in Cambodia during tyrant Pol Pot's bloody 'Year Zero' cleansing campaign, which claimed the lives of two million 'undesirable' civilians.

title: The World's Fastest Indian
simple_desc: The story of New Zealander Burt Munro, who spent years rebuilding a 1920 Indian motorcycle, which helped him set the land speed world record at Utah's Bonneville Salt Flats in 1967.

title: Aguirre, the Wrath of God
simple_desc: In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.

title: Gangubai Kathiawadi
simple_desc: Duped and sold to a brothel, a young woman fearlessly reclaims her power, using underworld connections to preside over the world she was once a pawn in.

title: The Postman
simple_desc: A simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet, and then uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

title: Embrace of the Serpent
simple_desc: The story of the relationship between Karamakate, an Amazonian shaman and last survivor of his people, and two scientists who work together over the course of forty years to search the Amazon for a sacred healing plant.

title: Argo
simple_desc: Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.

title: Serpico
simple_desc: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

title: Donnie Brasco
simple_desc: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.

title: The Theory of Everything
simple_desc: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.

title: Bonnie and Clyde
simple_desc: Bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.

title: Ray
simple_desc: The story of the life and career of the legendary rhythm and blues musician Ray Charles, from his humble beginnings in the South, where he went blind at age seven, to his meteoric rise to stardom during the 1950s and 1960s.

title: Malcolm X
simple_desc: Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam and his eventual assassination.

title: The Last Emperor
simple_desc: Bernardo Bertolucci's Oscar-winning dramatisation of the life story of China's last emperor, Pu Yi.

title: The Wind Rises
simple_desc: A look at the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the man who designed Japanese fighter planes during World War II.

title: Finding Neverland
simple_desc: The story of Sir J.M. Barrie's friendship with a family who inspired him to create Peter Pan.

title: Never Look Away

title: A Man for All Seasons

title: The Motorcycle Diaries

title: Frost/Nixon

title: Just Mercy

title: Freedom Writers

title: The Hurricane

title: The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind

title: Mutiny on the Bounty

title: The Favourite

title: The Aviator

simple_desc: Centering on Ip Man's migration to Hong Kong in 1949 as he attempts to propagate his discipline of Wing Chun martial arts.

title: Good Night, and Good Luck.

title: McFarland, USA

title: Man on the Moon
simple_desc: The life and career of legendary comedian Andy Kaufman.

title: The Greatest Game Ever Played

simple_desc: In 1931, three half-white, half-Aboriginal girls escape after being plucked from their houses to be trained as domestic staff, and set off on a journey across the Outback.

title: Trumbo
simple_desc: In 1947, Dalton Trumbo was Hollywood's top screenwriter, until he and other artists were jailed and blacklisted for their political beliefs.

title: The King and I
simple_desc: A widow accepts a job as a live-in governess to the King of Siam's children.

title: Immortal Beloved
simple_desc: The life and death of the legendary Ludwig van Beethoven. Besides all the work he is known for, the composer once wrote a famous love letter to a nameless beloved, and the movie tries to ...                See full summary »

title: American Splendor
simple_desc: An original mix of fiction and reality illuminates the life of comic book hero everyman Harvey Pekar.

title: Amazing Grace
simple_desc: The idealist William Wilberforce (Ioan Gruffudd) maneuvers his way through Parliament, endeavoring to end the British transatlantic slave trade.

title: The Good Lie
simple_desc: A group of Sudanese refugees, given the chance to resettle in the U.S., arrive in Kansas City, Missouri, where their encounter with an employment agency counselor forever changes all of their lives.

simple_desc: The story of the notorious French gangster Jacques Mesrine, with the focus on his life and death as France's Public Enemy No. 1 in the 1970s.

simple_desc: The story of singer Tina Turner's rise to stardom and how she gained the courage to break free from her abusive husband, Ike Turner.

title: Heavenly Creatures
simple_desc: Two teenage girls share a unique bond; their parents, concerned that the friendship is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

title: Belfast
simple_desc: A young boy and his working-class Belfast family experience the tumultuous late 1960s.

title: Funny Girl

title: The Queen
simple_desc: After the death of Princess Diana, Queen Elizabeth II struggles with her reaction to a sequence of events nobody could have predicted.

title: Gods and Monsters
simple_desc: The last days of Frankenstein (1931) director James Whale are explored.

title: Marshall
simple_desc: The story of Thurgood Marshall, the crusading lawyer who would become the first African-American Supreme Court Justice, as he battles through one of his career-defining cases.

title: 24 Hour Party People
simple_desc: In 1976, Tony Wilson sets up Factory Records and brings Manchester's music to the world.

title: Angela's Ashes
simple_desc: Based on the best-selling autobiography by Irish expatriate Frank McCourt, Angela's Ashes follows the experiences of young Frankie and his family as they try against all odds to escape the ...                See full summary »

title: A Street Cat Named Bob
simple_desc: The true feel-good story of how James Bowen, a busker and recovering drug addict, has his life transformed when he meets a stray ginger cat. Based on the international best selling book.

title: Lorenzo's Oil
simple_desc: Lorenzo Odone, a Virginia 5-year-old, develops a degenerative nerve disease so rare that nobody is working on a cure, so his parents decide to immerse themselves in research and tackle the problem themselves.

title: The Baader Meinhof Complex

title: Max Manus: Man of War
simple_desc: The true story about one of the most brilliant saboteurs during World War II and his battle to overcome his inner demons.

title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
simple_desc: Based on the true story of a real-life friendship between Fred Rogers and journalist Lloyd Vogel.

title: The Founder

title: Born on the Fourth of July
simple_desc: The biography of Ron Kovic. Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, he becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country for which he fought.

title: Papillon

title: Mask

title: Anthropoid

title: The Butler

title: An American Crime

title: Quills

title: The Professor and the Madman

title: Secretariat

title: Stan & Ollie

title: Life Is Beautiful

title: Back to the Future

title: The Intouchables

title: Modern Times

title: City Lights

title: Anbe Sivam

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse

title: Coco

title: 3 Idiots

title: The Great Dictator

title: Dil Bechara
simple_desc: The emotional journey of two hopelessly-in-love youngsters; a young girl, Kizie, who is suffering from cancer; and Manny, a boy Kizie meets at a support group.

title: Toy Story

title: Up

title: Amélie

title: The Sting
simple_desc: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

title: Singin' in the Rain

title: The Apartment

title: The Kid
simple_desc: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put their relationship in jeopardy.

title: Chhichhore
simple_desc: A tragic incident forces Anirudh, a middle-aged man, to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce his college days along with his friends, who were labelled as losers.

title: Bangalore Days
simple_desc: A fun roller coaster ride about three young people, Aju, Divya and Kuttan who are cousins, reach Bangalore to dream, discover and explore.

title: Khosla Ka Ghosla!
simple_desc: A Delhi-based retired middle-class man tries half-heartedly to get his land back from a swindling property dealer with the help of his sons and their friends.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
simple_desc: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own - a mission that could mean the end of the Guardians if not successful.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
simple_desc: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: The Truman Show
simple_desc: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

title: Snatch
simple_desc: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

title: Finding Nemo
simple_desc: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: Green Book
simple_desc: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver for an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
simple_desc: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

title: Some Like It Hot
simple_desc: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

title: Klaus
simple_desc: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

title: Gangs of Wasseypur
simple_desc: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
simple_desc: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their friends gets engaged.

title: To Be or Not to Be
simple_desc: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

title: Sherlock Jr.
simple_desc: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
simple_desc: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

title: The Big Lebowski

title: Dead Poets Society
simple_desc: Maverick teacher John Keating uses poetry to embolden his boarding school students to new heights of self-expression.

title: Ratatouille
simple_desc: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
simple_desc: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

title: Inside Out
simple_desc: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
simple_desc: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

title: Monsters, Inc.
simple_desc: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
simple_desc: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

title: My Neighbor Totoro
simple_desc: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

title: Wild Tales
simple_desc: Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

title: The Iron Giant
simple_desc: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

title: Paper Moon
simple_desc: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

title: Mary and Max
simple_desc: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

title: It Happened One Night

title: PK
simple_desc: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of there religious views on there people.

title: Underground
simple_desc: A group of Serbian socialists prepares for the war in a surreal underground filled by parties, tragedies, love, and hate.

title: The General

title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan

title: Sholay

title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
simple_desc: A naive youth leader is appointed to fill a vacancy in the U.S. Senate. His idealistic plans promptly collide with corruption at home and subterfuge from his hero in Washington, but he tries to forge ahead despite attacks on his character.

title: The Gold Rush

title: Barfi!
simple_desc: Three young people learn that love can neither be defined nor contained by society's definition of normal and abnormal.

title: Dil Chahta Hai
simple_desc: Three inseparable childhood friends are just out of college. Nothing comes between them - until they each fall in love, and their wildly different approaches to relationships creates tension.

title: Rang De Basanti

title: Jean de Florette

title: Safety Last!
simple_desc: A boy leaves his small country town and heads to the big city to get a job. As soon as he makes it big his sweetheart will join him and marry him. His enthusiasm to get ahead leads to some interesting adventures.

title: Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
simple_desc: A gangster sets out to fulfill his father's dream of becoming a doctor.

title: The Circus
simple_desc: The Tramp finds work and the girl of his dreams at a circus.

title: Hera Pheri
simple_desc: Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?

title: OMG: Oh My God!
simple_desc: A shopkeeper takes God to court when his shop is destroyed by an earthquake.

title: Queen
simple_desc: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

title: Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar
simple_desc: A rich brat and a poor chap try to woo a girl, with their rivalry culminating in the most prestigious college event - the marathon cycle race.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
simple_desc: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: Deadpool
simple_desc: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

title: The Princess Bride
simple_desc: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

title: La La Land
simple_desc: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

title: Zootopia
simple_desc: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

title: CODA

title: Aladdin
simple_desc: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

title: Life of Brian
simple_desc: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

title: Soul
simple_desc: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

title: Groundhog Day
simple_desc: A narcissistic, self-centered weatherman finds himself in a time loop on Groundhog Day, and the day keeps repeating until he gets it right.

title: The Graduate
simple_desc: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

title: Do the Right Thing
simple_desc: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

title: Young Frankenstein

title: Chungking Express

title: Annie Hall

title: Roman Holiday
simple_desc: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

title: Being There

title: La Dolce Vita
simple_desc: A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering tabloid journalist living in Rome.

title: Secrets & Lies
simple_desc: Following the death of her adoptive parents, a successful young black optometrist establishes contact with her biological mother -- a lonely white factory worker living in poverty in East London.

title: Kind Hearts and Coronets
simple_desc: A distant poor relative of the Duke D'Ascoyne plots to inherit the title by murdering the eight other heirs who stand ahead of him in the line of succession.

title: Stalag 17
simple_desc: After two Americans are killed while escaping from a German P.O.W. camp in World War II, the barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

title: My Sassy Girl
simple_desc: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

title: My Man Godfrey
simple_desc: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler - but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

title: The Shop Around the Corner
simple_desc: Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.

title: Day for Night
simple_desc: A committed film director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of crises, personal and professional, among the cast and crew.

title: Black Cat, White Cat

title: Andaz Apna Apna
simple_desc: Two slackers competing for the affections of an heiress inadvertently become her protectors from an evil criminal.

title: Carry On, Munna Bhai
simple_desc: Munna Bhai embarks on a journey with Mahatma Gandhi in order to fight against a corrupt property dealer.

title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish

title: Knives Out
simple_desc: A detective investigates the death of the patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

title: Almost Famous

title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
simple_desc: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

title: Jojo Rabbit
simple_desc: A young German boy in the Hitler Youth whose hero and imaginary friend is the country's dictator is shocked to discover that his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.

title: Thor: Ragnarok
simple_desc: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

title: Shrek

title: In Bruges
simple_desc: Guilt-stricken after a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.

title: Shaun of the Dead
simple_desc: The uneventful, aimless lives of a London electronics salesman and his layabout roommate are disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.

title: The Blues Brothers

title: Toy Story 2
simple_desc: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

title: This Is Spinal Tap

title: Charade
simple_desc: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

title: The Artist
simple_desc: An egomaniacal film star develops a relationship with a young dancer against the backdrop of Hollywood's silent era.

title: Sing Street
simple_desc: A boy growing up in Dublin during the 1980s escapes his strained family life by starting a band to impress the mysterious girl he likes.

title: C.R.A.Z.Y.
simple_desc: A young French Canadian, one of five boys in a conservative family in the 1960s and 1970s, struggles to reconcile his emerging identity with his father's values.

title: A Christmas Story
simple_desc: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie Parker attempts to convince his parents, teacher, and Santa Claus that a Red Ryder Range 200 Shot BB gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

title: Harold and Maude
simple_desc: Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.

title: The Philadelphia Story
simple_desc: When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.

title: Arsenic and Old Lace

title: Cléo from 5 to 7
simple_desc: Cleo, a singer and hypochondriac, becomes increasingly worried that she might have cancer while awaiting test results from her doctor.

title: Tampopo
simple_desc: A truck driver stops at a small family-run noodle shop and decides to help its fledgling business. The story is intertwined with various vignettes about the relationship of love and food.

title: I Remember
simple_desc: A series of comedic and nostalgic vignettes set in a 1930s Italian coastal town.

title: Kal Ho Naa Ho

title: Harvey
simple_desc: Due to his insistence that he has an invisible six foot-tall rabbit for a best friend, a whimsical middle-aged man is thought by his family to be insane - but he may be wiser than anyone knows.

title: The Thin Man
simple_desc: Former detective Nick Charles and his wealthy wife Nora investigate a murder case, mostly for the fun of it.

title: Miracle on 34th Street
simple_desc: After a divorced New York mother hires a nice old man to play Santa Claus at Macy's, she is startled by his claim to be the genuine article. When his sanity is questioned, a lawyer defends him in court by arguing that he's not mistaken.

title: Mimi

title: Sullivan's Travels
simple_desc: Hollywood director John L. Sullivan sets out to experience life as a homeless person in order to gain relevant life experience for his next movie.

title: The Rules of the Game
simple_desc: A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.

title: One, Two, Three
simple_desc: In West Berlin during the Cold War, a Coca-Cola executive is given the task of taking care of his boss' socialite daughter.

title: Dev.D
simple_desc: After breaking up with his childhood sweetheart, a young man finds solace in drugs. Meanwhile, a teenage girl is caught in the world of prostitution. Will they be destroyed, or will they find redemption?

title: No Man's Land
simple_desc: Bosnia and Herzegovina during 1993 at the time of the heaviest fighting between the two warring sides. Two soldiers from opposing sides in the conflict, Nino and Ciki, become trapped in no man's land, whilst a third soldier becomes a living booby trap.

title: Badhaai Ho
simple_desc: A man is embarrassed when he finds out his mother is pregnant.

title: Jab We Met
simple_desc: A depressed wealthy businessman finds his life changing after he meets a spunky and care-free young woman.

title: Pad Man
simple_desc: Upon realizing the extent to which women are affected by their menses, a man sets out to create a sanitary pad machine and to provide inexpensive sanitary pads to the women of rural India.
A scientist invents a time machine, which leads to a bitter battle between his evil twin brother and his son.

title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
simple_desc: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.

title: The Breakfast Club
simple_desc: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a great deal more in common than they thought.

title: The Gentlemen
simple_desc: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.

title: The Big Short
simple_desc: In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the United States mortgage market. In their research, they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

title: The Worst Person in the World
simple_desc: The chronicles of four years in the life of Julie, a young woman who navigates the troubled waters of her love life and struggles to find her career path, leading her to take a realistic look at who she really is.

title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
simple_desc: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

title: Moonrise Kingdom
simple_desc: A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out to find them.

title: About Time
simple_desc: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

title: Ghostbusters
simple_desc: Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.

title: The Sandlot
simple_desc: In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.

title: Little Miss Sunshine
simple_desc: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

title: Hot Fuzz
simple_desc: A skilled London police officer, after irritating superiors with his embarrassing effectiveness, is transferred to a village where the easygoing officers object to his fervor for regulations, as a string of grisly murders strikes the town.

title: Back to the Future Part II
simple_desc: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

title: Captain Fantastic
simple_desc: In the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, challenging his idea of what it means to be a parent.

title: Mary Poppins
simple_desc: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

title: Big Hero 6
simple_desc: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

title: Isle of Dogs
simple_desc: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.

title: To Have and Have Not
simple_desc: During World War II, American expatriate Harry Morgan helps transport a French Resistance leader and his beautiful wife to Martinique while romancing a sensuous lounge singer.

title: Bringing Up Baby
simple_desc: While trying to secure a $1 million donation for his museum, a befuddled paleontologist is pursued by a flighty and often irritating heiress and her pet leopard, Baby.

title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
simple_desc: A national manhunt is ordered for a rebellious kid and his foster uncle who go missing in the wild New Zealand bush.

title: The King of Comedy
simple_desc: Rupert Pupkin is a passionate yet unsuccessful comic who craves nothing more than to be in the spotlight and to achieve this, he stalks and kidnaps his idol to take the spotlight for himself.

title: Paddington 2
simple_desc: Paddington, now happily settled with the Brown family and a popular member of the local community, picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucy's 100th birthday, only for the gift to be stolen.

title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
simple_desc: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

title: Pride

title: Ed Wood
simple_desc: Ambitious but troubled movie director Edward D. Wood Jr. tries his best to fulfill his dreams despite his lack of talent.

title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
simple_desc: A couple's attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her African-American fiancé.

title: Manhattan
simple_desc: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

title: His Girl Friday
simple_desc: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

title: Hannah and Her Sisters
simple_desc: Between two Thanksgivings two years apart, Hannah's husband falls in love with her sister Lee, while her hypochondriac ex-husband rekindles his relationship with her sister Holly.

title: You Can't Take It with You
simple_desc: The son of a snobbish Wall Street banker becomes engaged to a woman from a good-natured but decidedly eccentric family, not realizing that his father is trying to force her family from their home for a real estate development.

title: Playtime
simple_desc: Monsieur Hulot curiously wanders around a high-tech Paris, paralleling a trip with a group of American tourists. Meanwhile, a nightclub/restaurant prepares its opening night, but it's still under construction.

title: The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie
simple_desc: A surreal, virtually plotless series of dreams centered around six middle-class people and their consistently interrupted attempts to have a meal together.

title: The Postman
simple_desc: A simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet, and then uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

title: The Chorus
simple_desc: The new teacher at a severely administered boys' boarding school works to positively affect the students' lives through music.

title: Crimes and Misdemeanors
simple_desc: An ophthalmologist's mistress threatens to reveal their affair to his wife while a married documentary filmmaker is infatuated with another woman.

title: That Obscure Object of Desire
simple_desc: Recounted in flashback are the romantic perils of Mathieu, a middle-aged French sophisticate as he falls for his nineteen-year-old former chambermaid Conchita.

title: Eat Drink Man Woman
simple_desc: A senior chef lives with his three grown daughters; the middle one finds her future plans affected by unexpected events and the life changes of the other household members.

title: Tokyo Godfathers
simple_desc: On Christmas Eve, three homeless people living on the streets of Tokyo discover a newborn baby among the trash and set out to find its parents.

title: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
simple_desc: In 1900, a young widow finds her seaside cottage is haunted and forms a unique relationship with the ghost.

title: Duck Soup
simple_desc: Rufus T. Firefly is named the dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of his wealthy backer Mrs. Teasdale, contending with two inept spies who can't seem to keep straight which side they're on.

title: Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
simple_desc: A unassuming greeting card poet from a small town in Vermont heads to New York City upon inheriting a massive fortune and is immediately hounded by those who wish to take advantage of him.

title: My Life as a Zucchini
simple_desc: After losing his mother, a young boy is sent to an orphanage with other orphans his age where he begins to learn the meaning of trust and true love.

title: Knockin' on Heaven's Door
simple_desc: Two terminally ill patients escape from a hospital, steal a car and rush towards the sea.

title: A Night at the Opera
simple_desc: A sly business manager and the wacky friends of two opera singers in Italy help them achieve success in America while humiliating their stuffy and snobbish enemies.

title: Ninotchka
simple_desc: A stern Soviet woman sent to Paris to supervise the sale of jewels seized from Russian nobles finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.

title: Minnal Murali
simple_desc: An unusual event creates a lightning which in turns gives superhuman abilies to an ambitious tailor ,whose responsibility is now to protect his home village from the evil plans of the antagonist.

title: Ernest & Celestine
simple_desc: The story of an unlikely friendship between a bear, Ernest, and a young mouse named Celestine.

title: Hindi Medium
simple_desc: A couple from Chandni Chowk aspire to give their daughter the best education and thus be a part of and accepted by the elite of Delhi.

title: English Vinglish
simple_desc: A quiet, sweet tempered housewife endures small slights from her well-educated husband and daughter every day because of her inability to speak and understand English.

title: Vicky Donor
simple_desc: A man is brought in by an infertility doctor to supply him with his sperm, where he becomes the biggest sperm donor for his clinic.

title: The Banshees of Inisherin
simple_desc: Two lifelong friends find themselves at an impasse when one abruptly ends their relationship, with alarming consequences for both of them.

title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
simple_desc: A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

title: The Goonies
simple_desc: A group of young misfits called The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on an adventure to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.

title: The Hangover
simple_desc: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

title: Airplane!
simple_desc: After the crew becomes sick with food poisoning, a neurotic ex-fighter pilot must land a commercial airplane full of passengers safely.

title: Home Alone
simple_desc: An eight-year-old troublemaker, mistakenly left home alone, must defend his home against a pair of burglars on Christmas eve.

title: Tangled
simple_desc: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

title: Blazing Saddles
simple_desc: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

title: Silver Linings Playbook

title: Toy Story 4
simple_desc: When a new toy called "Forky" joins Woody and the gang, a road trip alongside old and new friends reveals how big the world can be for a toy.

title: 500 Days of Summer
simple_desc: After being dumped by the girl he believes to be his soulmate, hopeless romantic Tom Hansen reflects on their relationship to try and figure out where things went wrong and how he can win her back.

title: Lost in Translation

title: Evil Dead II
simple_desc: The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)

title: A Man Called Ove
simple_desc: Ove, an ill-tempered, isolated retiree who spends his days enforcing block association rules and visiting his wife's grave, has finally given up on life just as an unlikely friendship develops with his boisterous new neighbors.

title: Wreck-It Ralph

title: Midnight in Paris
simple_desc: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.

title: As Good as It Gets
simple_desc: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
simple_desc: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?

title: Kung Fu Hustle

title: Flipped
simple_desc: Two eighth-graders start to have feelings for each other despite being total opposites.

title: When Harry Met Sally...
simple_desc: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

title: Naked
simple_desc: An unemployed Mancunian vents his rage on unsuspecting strangers as he embarks on a nocturnal London odyssey.

title: Adaptation.
simple_desc: A lovelorn screenwriter becomes desperate as he tries and fails to adapt 'The Orchid Thief' by Susan Orlean for the screen.

title: Being John Malkovich
simple_desc: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

title: Clerks

title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
simple_desc: When Stan Marsh and his friends go see an R-rated movie, they start cursing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

title: The Quiet Man

title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
simple_desc: High schooler Greg, who spends most of his time making parodies of classic movies with his co-worker Earl, finds his outlook forever altered after befriending a classmate who has just been diagnosed with cancer.

title: Breaking Away

title: What's Up, Doc?
simple_desc: The accidental mix-up of four identical plaid overnight bags leads to a series of increasingly wild and wacky situations.

title: Porco Rosso

title: Short Cuts
simple_desc: The day-to-day lives of several suburban Los Angeles residents.

title: Night on Earth

title: My Dinner with Andre

title: Hedwig and the Angry Inch

title: Love and Death

title: Adam's Apples

title: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time

title: The Purple Rose of Cairo
simple_desc: In 1935 New Jersey, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.

title: Eega
simple_desc: A murdered man is reincarnated as a housefly and seeks to avenge his death.

title: The Awful Truth
simple_desc: A married couple file an amicable divorce, but find it harder to let go of each other than they initially thought.

title: The Lady Eve

title: The Godfather

title: 12 Angry Men

title: Pulp Fiction

title: Jai Bhim

title: Goodfellas

title: The Green Mile

title: Se7en

title: The Silence of the Lambs

title: City of God
simple_desc: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

title: Nayakan

title: The Departed

title: Joker

title: Witness for the Prosecution

title: Kaithi

title: High and Low

title: Sardar Udham

title: Black Friday

title: Thani Oruvan

title: Heat

title: Scarface

title: A Clockwork Orange

title: Once Upon a Time in America

title: Reservoir Dogs
simple_desc: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird

title: The Sting
simple_desc: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

title: M

title: Double Indemnity
simple_desc: A Los Angeles insurance representative lets an alluring housewife seduce him into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, an insurance investigator.

title: Raatchasan
simple_desc: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

title: The Young and the Damned

title: Drishyam
simple_desc: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

title: Khosla Ka Ghosla!

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
simple_desc: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: Taxi Driver

title: No Country for Old Men
simple_desc: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

title: Casino
simple_desc: In Las Vegas, two best friends - a mafia enforcer and a casino executive - compete for a gambling empire and a fast-living, fast-loving socialite.

title: Batman Begins

title: Snatch
simple_desc: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

title: L.A. Confidential
simple_desc: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

title: Drishyam 2
simple_desc: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Vijay Salgaonkar be able to protect his family this time?

title: Dial M for Murder
simple_desc: A former tennis star arranges the murder of his adulterous wife.

title: Gangs of Wasseypur
simple_desc: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

simple_desc: Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.

title: Andhadhun
simple_desc: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

title: Rashomon
simple_desc: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

title: Z
simple_desc: The public murder of a prominent politician and doctor amid a violent demonstration is covered up by military and government officials. A tenacious magistrate is determined not to let them get away with it.

title: Drishyam
simple_desc: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

title: Rocco and His Brothers

title: Close-Up
simple_desc: The true story of Hossain Sabzian, a cinephile who impersonated the director Mohsen Makhmalbaf to convince a family they would star in his so-called new film.

title: Paan Singh Tomar

title: Prisoners
simple_desc: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel

title: The Big Lebowski

title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri

title: Fargo

title: Spotlight

title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels

title: Memories of Murder

title: Cool Hand Luke
simple_desc: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

title: La haine
simple_desc: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

title: On the Waterfront

title: In the Name of the Father

title: Paper Moon
simple_desc: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

title: The 400 Blows
simple_desc: A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

title: Diabolique
simple_desc: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal plan to murder him with what they believe is the perfect alibi.

title: Talvar
simple_desc: An experienced investigator confronts several conflicting theories about the perpetrators of a violent double homicide.

title: White Heat
simple_desc: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.

title: A Wednesday

title: Time of the Gypsies

title: Pink
simple_desc: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

title: Rang De Basanti
simple_desc: The story of six young Indians who assist an English woman to film a documentary on the freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to relive the long-forgotten saga of freedom.

title: Article 15
simple_desc: In the rural heartlands of India, an upright police officer sets out on a crusade against violent caste-based crimes and discrimination.

title: Rififi

title: Omkara

title: The Bandit
simple_desc: Baran the Bandit, released from prison after 35 years, searches for vengeance and his lover.

title: Hera Pheri
simple_desc: Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?

title: John Wick: Chapter 4

title: Zootopia

title: Sin City
simple_desc: An exploration of the dark and miserable Basin City and three of its residents, all of whom are caught up in violent corruption.

title: Out of the Past
simple_desc: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses, and duplicitous dames.

title: Dog Day Afternoon

title: Slumdog Millionaire
simple_desc: A Mumbai teenager reflects on his life after being accused of cheating on the Indian version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?".

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
simple_desc: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

title: Perfect Blue
simple_desc: A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.

title: Dogville
simple_desc: A woman on the run from the mob is reluctantly accepted in a small Colorado community in exchange for labor, but when a search visits the town she finds out that their support has a price.

title: The Invisible Guest
simple_desc: A successful entrepreneur accused of murder and a witness preparation expert have less than three hours to come up with an impregnable defense.

title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
simple_desc: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.

title: Chungking Express

title: The Night of the Hunter
simple_desc: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid the $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

title: The Maltese Falcon

title: Papillon
