simple_desc: A sheltered and manipulative Southern belle and a roguish profiteer face off in a turbulent romance as the society around them crumbles with the end of slavery and is rebuilt during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

title: Some Like It Hot
simple_desc: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

title: The Secret in Their Eyes
simple_desc: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
simple_desc: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their friends gets engaged.

title: To Be or Not to Be
simple_desc: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

title: Sherlock Jr.
simple_desc: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

title: The Handmaiden
simple_desc: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

title: The Sound of Music
simple_desc: A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.

title: Before Sunrise
simple_desc: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

title: In the Mood for Love
simple_desc: Two neighbors form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

title: Before Sunset
simple_desc: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

title: Rebecca
simple_desc: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

title: The Best Years of Our Lives
simple_desc: Three World War II veterans, two of them traumatized or disabled, return home to the American midwest to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

title: It Happened One Night
simple_desc: A renegade reporter trailing a young runaway heiress for a big story joins her on a bus heading from Florida to New York, and they end up stuck with each other when the bus leaves them behind at one of the stops.

title: Three Colors: Red
simple_desc: A model discovers a retired judge is keen on invading people's privacy.

title: Wild Strawberries
simple_desc: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

title: Farewell My Concubine
simple_desc: Two boys meet at an opera training school in Peking in 1924. Their resulting friendship will span nearly 70 years and will endure some of the most troublesome times in China's history.

title: The Red Shoes
simple_desc: A young ballet dancer is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.

title: A Woman Under the Influence
simple_desc: Although wife and mother Mabel is loved by her husband Nick, her mental illness places a strain on the marriage.

title: Yi Yi: A One and a Two...
simple_desc: Each member of a middle-class Taipei family seeks to reconcile past and present relationships within their daily lives.

title: The Gold Rush
simple_desc: A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

title: Barfi!
simple_desc: Three young people learn that love can neither be defined nor contained by society's definition of normal and abnormal.

title: Dil Chahta Hai
simple_desc: Three inseparable childhood friends are just out of college. Nothing comes between them - until they each fall in love, and their wildly different approaches to relationships creates tension.

title: A Moment to Remember
simple_desc: A young couple's enduring love is tested when 27-year-old Su-jin is diagnosed with a rare form of Alzheimer's disease.

title: Raise the Red Lantern
simple_desc: A young woman becomes the fourth wife of a wealthy lord, and must learn to live with the strict rules and tensions within the household.

title: Sunrise
simple_desc: A sophisticated city woman seduces a farmer and convinces him to murder his wife and join her in the city, but he ends up rekindling his romance with his wife when he changes his mind at the last moment.

title: A Short Film About Love
simple_desc: A naive inexperienced young man spies on a woman who lives across the courtyard, and falls in love with her. He starts using tricks which he hopes will lead to them meeting.

title: The Circus
simple_desc: The Tramp finds work and the girl of his dreams at a circus.

title: Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar
simple_desc: A rich brat and a poor chap try to woo a girl, with their rivalry culminating in the most prestigious college event - the marathon cycle race.

title: The Princess Bride
simple_desc: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

title: La La Land
simple_desc: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

title: Her
simple_desc: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

title: Aladdin
simple_desc: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

title: Beauty and the Beast
simple_desc: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

title: Out of the Past
simple_desc: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses, and duplicitous dames.

title: Groundhog Day
simple_desc: A narcissistic, self-centered weatherman finds himself in a time loop on Groundhog Day, and the day keeps repeating until he gets it right.

title: The Graduate
simple_desc: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

title: Big Fish
simple_desc: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.

title: Slumdog Millionaire
simple_desc: A Mumbai teenager reflects on his life after being accused of cheating on the Indian version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?".

title: Chungking Express
simple_desc: Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal waitress at a late-night restaurant he frequents.

title: Fiddler on the Roof

title: Annie Hall
simple_desc: Alvy Singer, a divorced Jewish comedian, reflects on his relationship with ex-lover Annie Hall, an aspiring nightclub singer, which ended abruptly just like his previous marriages.

title: The Last Picture Show
simple_desc: In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied North Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.

title: The Maltese Falcon
simple_desc: San Francisco private detective Sam Spade takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar and their quest for a priceless statuette, with the stakes rising after his partner is murdered.

title: Roman Holiday
simple_desc: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

title: Cinderella Man
simple_desc: The story of James J. Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to challenge for the heavyweight championship of the world.

title: Wings of Desire

title: I Want to Eat Your Pancreas
simple_desc: A high school student discovers one of his classmates, Sakura Yamauchi, is suffering from a terminal illness. This secret brings the two together, as she lives out her final moments.

title: The Legend of 1900
simple_desc: A baby boy discovered on an ocean liner in 1900 grows into a musical prodigy, never setting foot on land.

title: My Sassy Girl
simple_desc: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

title: My Man Godfrey
simple_desc: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler - but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

title: Brief Encounter
simple_desc: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
simple_desc: When Raj meets Simran in Europe, it isn't love at first sight but when Simran moves to India for an arranged marriage, love makes its presence felt.

title: Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter... and Spring
simple_desc: A boy is raised by a Buddhist monk in an isolated floating temple where the years pass like the seasons.

title: The Shop Around the Corner
simple_desc: Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.

title: Day for Night
simple_desc: A committed film director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of crises, personal and professional, among the cast and crew.

title: Stairway to Heaven
simple_desc: A British wartime aviator who cheats death must argue for his life before a celestial court, hoping to prolong his fledgling romance with an American girl.

title: Ali: Fear Eats the Soul
simple_desc: A lonely widow meets a much younger Moroccan worker in a bar during a rainstorm. They fall in love, to their own surprise and to the outright shock of their families, colleagues, and drinking buddies.

title: Limelight
simple_desc: A fading comedian and a suicidally despondent ballet dancer must look to each other to find purpose and hope in their lives.

title: Black Cat, White Cat
simple_desc: Matko and his son Zare live on the banks of the Danube river and get by through hustling and basically doing anything to make a living. In order to pay off a business debt Matko agrees to marry off Zare to the sister of a local gangster.

title: Andaz Apna Apna
simple_desc: Two slackers competing for the affections of an heiress inadvertently become her protectors from an evil criminal.

title: Carry On, Munna Bhai
simple_desc: Munna Bhai embarks on a journey with Mahatma Gandhi in order to fight against a corrupt property dealer.

title: Arjun Reddy
simple_desc: Arjun Reddy, a short tempered house surgeon gets used to drugs and drinks when his girlfriend is forced to marry another person.

title: Titanic
simple_desc: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Shrek
simple_desc: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

title: True Romance
simple_desc: In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine, the Mob, track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.

title: Edward Scissorhands
simple_desc: The solitary life of an artificial man - who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands - is upended when he is taken in by a suburban family.

title: Marriage Story
simple_desc: Noah Baumbach's incisive and compassionate look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together.

title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
simple_desc: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

title: Doctor Zhivago
simple_desc: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.

title: Before Midnight
simple_desc: We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.

title: Charade
simple_desc: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

title: Let the Right One In
simple_desc: Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

title: Notorious
simple_desc: The daughter of a convicted Nazi spy is asked by American agents to gather information on a ring of Nazi scientists in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

title: The Artist
simple_desc: An egomaniacal film star develops a relationship with a young dancer against the backdrop of Hollywood's silent era.

title: Sing Street
simple_desc: A boy growing up in Dublin during the 1980s escapes his strained family life by starting a band to impress the mysterious girl he likes.

title: Three Colors: Blue
simple_desc: A woman struggles to find a way to live her life after the death of her husband and child.

title: Harold and Maude
simple_desc: Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.

title: Talk to Her
simple_desc: Two men share an odd friendship while they care for two women who are both in deep comas.

title: The Philadelphia Story
simple_desc: When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.

title: Mildred Pierce
simple_desc: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
simple_desc: When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses in King Richard's absence in 1190s England, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a resistance movement.

title: My Name Is Khan
simple_desc: An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President of the United States seriously and embarks on a cross-country journey.

title: Head-On
simple_desc: With the intention to break free from the strict familial restrictions, a suicidal young woman sets up a marriage of convenience with a forty-year-old addict, an act that will lead to an outburst of envious love.

title: Kal Ho Naa Ho

title: The Thin Man
simple_desc: Former detective Nick Charles and his wealthy wife Nora investigate a murder case, mostly for the fun of it.

title: The Way He Looks
simple_desc: Leonardo is a blind teenager searching for independence. His everyday life, the relationship with his best friend Giovana, and the way he sees the world change completely with the arrival of Gabriel.

title: In a Lonely Place
simple_desc: A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. However, she soon starts to have her doubts.

title: Gully Boy
simple_desc: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

title: Sullivan's Travels
simple_desc: Hollywood director John L. Sullivan sets out to experience life as a homeless person in order to gain relevant life experience for his next movie.

title: 3-Iron
simple_desc: A transient young man breaks into empty homes to partake of the vacationing residents' lives for a few days.

title: Hiroshima Mon Amour
simple_desc: A French actress filming an anti-war film in Hiroshima has an affair with a married Japanese architect as they share their differing perspectives on war.

title: Dev.D
simple_desc: After breaking up with his childhood sweetheart, a young man finds solace in drugs. Meanwhile, a teenage girl is caught in the world of prostitution. Will they be destroyed, or will they find redemption?

title: Beauty and the Beast
simple_desc: A beautiful young woman takes her father's place as the prisoner of a mysterious beast, who wishes to marry her.

title: Jab We Met
simple_desc: A depressed wealthy businessman finds his life changing after he meets a spunky and care-free young woman.

title: Pride & Prejudice
simple_desc: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?

title: Call Me by Your Name
simple_desc: In 1980s Italy, romance blossoms between a seventeen-year-old student and the older man hired as his father's research assistant.

title: Little Women
simple_desc: Jo March reflects back and forth on her life, telling the beloved story of the March sisters - four young women, each determined to live life on her own terms.

title: The Notebook
simple_desc: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom. However, social differences soon get in the way.

title: The Worst Person in the World
simple_desc: The chronicles of four years in the life of Julie, a young woman who navigates the troubled waters of her love life and struggles to find her career path, leading her to take a realistic look at who she really is.

title: Cast Away
simple_desc: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

title: Moonrise Kingdom
simple_desc: A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out to find them.

title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
simple_desc: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with consequences.

title: About Time
simple_desc: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

title: Atonement
simple_desc: Thirteen-year-old fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.

title: To Have and Have Not
simple_desc: During World War II, American expatriate Harry Morgan helps transport a French Resistance leader and his beautiful wife to Martinique while romancing a sensuous lounge singer.

title: Walk the Line
simple_desc: A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis, and Carl Perkins.

title: The Remains of the Day
simple_desc: A butler who sacrificed body and soul to service in the years leading up to World War II realizes too late how misguided his loyalty was to his lordly employer.

title: The Best Offer
simple_desc: A lonely art expert working for a mysterious and reclusive heiress finds not only her art worth examining.

title: Pride
simple_desc: U.K. gay activists work to help miners during their lengthy strike of the National Union of Mineworkers in the summer of 1984.

title: Days of Heaven
simple_desc: A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.

title: My Fair Lady
simple_desc: In 1910s London, snobbish phonetics professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make crude flower girl, Eliza Doolittle, presentable in high society.

title: Cabaret
simple_desc: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

title: Once
simple_desc: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.

title: Gaslight
simple_desc: Ten years after her aunt was murdered in their London home, a woman returns from Italy in the 1880s to resume residence with her new husband. His obsessive interest in the home rises from a secret that may require driving his wife insane.

title: Whisper of the Heart
simple_desc: A love story between a girl who loves reading books, and a boy who has previously checked out all of the library books she chooses.

title: Manhattan
simple_desc: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

title: The Lunchbox
simple_desc: A mistaken delivery in Mumbai's famously efficient lunchbox delivery system connects a young housewife to an older man in the dusk of his life as they build a fantasy world together through notes in the lunchbox.

title: His Girl Friday
simple_desc: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

title: The Umbrellas of Cherbourg
simple_desc: A young woman separated from her lover by war faces a life-altering decision.

title: You Can't Take It with You
simple_desc: The son of a snobbish Wall Street banker becomes engaged to a woman from a good-natured but decidedly eccentric family, not realizing that his father is trying to force her family from their home for a real estate development.

title: The Postman
simple_desc: A simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet, and then uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

title: L'Avventura
simple_desc: A woman disappears during a Mediterranean boating trip. During the search, her lover and her best friend become attracted to each other.

title: That Obscure Object of Desire
simple_desc: Recounted in flashback are the romantic perils of Mathieu, a middle-aged French sophisticate as he falls for his nineteen-year-old former chambermaid Conchita.

title: Eat Drink Man Woman
simple_desc: A senior chef lives with his three grown daughters; the middle one finds her future plans affected by unexpected events and the life changes of the other household members.

title: Millennium Actress
simple_desc: A TV interviewer and his cameraman meet a former actress and travel through her memories and career.

title: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
simple_desc: In 1900, a young widow finds her seaside cottage is haunted and forms a unique relationship with the ghost.

title: Veer-Zaara
simple_desc: "Veer-Zaara" is a saga of love, separation, courage, and sacrifice. A love story that is an inspiration and will remain a legend forever.

title: Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
simple_desc: A unassuming greeting card poet from a small town in Vermont heads to New York City upon inheriting a massive fortune and is immediately hounded by those who wish to take advantage of him.

title: Ninotchka
simple_desc: A stern Soviet woman sent to Paris to supervise the sale of jewels seized from Russian nobles finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.

title: Lakshya
simple_desc: An aimless, jobless, irresponsible grown man joins the army and matures into a battlefield hero.

title: Vicky Donor
simple_desc: A man is brought in by an infertility doctor to supply him with his sperm, where he becomes the biggest sperm donor for his clinic.

title: Blue Is the Warmest Colour
simple_desc: Adèle's life is changed when she meets Emma, a young woman with blue hair, who will allow her to discover desire and to assert herself as a woman and as an adult. In front of others, Adèle grows, seeks herself, loses herself, and ultimately finds herself through love and loss.

title: Silver Linings Playbook
simple_desc: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

title: 500 Days of Summer
simple_desc: After being dumped by the girl he believes to be his soulmate, hopeless romantic Tom Hansen reflects on their relationship to try and figure out where things went wrong and how he can win her back.

title: Brokeback Mountain
simple_desc: Ennis and Jack are two shepherds who develop a sexual and emotional relationship. Their relationship becomes complicated when both of them get married to their respective girlfriends.

title: Mr. Nobody
simple_desc: A boy stands on a station platform as a train is about to leave. Should he go with his mother or stay with his father? Infinite possibilities arise from this decision. As long as he doesn't choose, anything is possible.

title: A Man Called Ove
simple_desc: Ove, an ill-tempered, isolated retiree who spends his days enforcing block association rules and visiting his wife's grave, has finally given up on life just as an unlikely friendship develops with his boisterous new neighbors.

title: Midnight in Paris
simple_desc: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.

title: As Good as It Gets
simple_desc: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

title: The Fault in Our Stars
simple_desc: Two teenage cancer patients begin a life-affirming journey to visit a reclusive author in Amsterdam.

title: Sense and Sensibility
simple_desc: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the title opposites.

title: Flipped
simple_desc: Two eighth-graders start to have feelings for each other despite being total opposites.

title: When Harry Met Sally...
simple_desc: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

title: The Theory of Everything
simple_desc: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.

title: Maurice
simple_desc: Two English school chums find themselves falling in love at Cambridge. To regain his place in society, Clive gives up Maurice and marries. While staying with Clive and his wife, Maurice discovers romance in the arms of the gamekeeper Alec.

title: The Wind Rises
simple_desc: A look at the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the man who designed Japanese fighter planes during World War II.

title: The Quiet Man
simple_desc: A retired American boxer returns to the village of his birth in 1920s Ireland, where he falls for a spirited redhead whose brother is contemptuous of their union.

title: Belle de Jour
simple_desc: A frigid young housewife decides to spend her midweek afternoons as a prostitute.

title: The African Queen
simple_desc: In WWI East Africa, a gin-swilling Canadian riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced English missionary to undertake a trip up a treacherous river and use his boat to attack a German gunship.

title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
simple_desc: High schooler Greg, who spends most of his time making parodies of classic movies with his co-worker Earl, finds his outlook forever altered after befriending a classmate who has just been diagnosed with cancer.

title: Happy Together
simple_desc: A couple take a trip to Argentina but both men find their lives drifting apart in opposite directions.

title: What's Up, Doc?
simple_desc: The accidental mix-up of four identical plaid overnight bags leads to a series of increasingly wild and wacky situations.

title: Never Look Away
simple_desc: German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime.

title: The Double Life of Véronique
simple_desc: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.

title: Good Bye Lenin!
simple_desc: In 1990, to protect his fragile mother from a fatal shock after a long coma, a young man must keep her from learning that her beloved nation of East Germany as she knew it has disappeared.

title: Marty
simple_desc: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

title: The Broken Circle Breakdown
simple_desc: Elise and Didier fall in love at first sight, in spite of their differences. He talks, she listens. He's a romantic atheist, she's a religious realist. When their daughter becomes seriously ill, their love is put on trial.

title: Splendor in the Grass
simple_desc: The love of high school sweethearts Deanie and Bud is weighed down by the oppressive expectations of their parents and society in smalltown Kansas in 1928, threatening the future of their relationship.

title: A Place in the Sun
simple_desc: A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.

title: Rockstar
simple_desc: Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer.

title: My Darling Clementine
simple_desc: After their cattle are stolen and their brother murdered, the Earp brothers have a score to settle with the Clanton family.

title: L'Eclisse
simple_desc: A young woman meets a vital young man, but their love affair is doomed because of the man's materialistic nature.

title: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
simple_desc: A high-school girl named Makoto acquires the power to travel back in time, and decides to use it for her own personal benefits. Little does she know that she is affecting the lives of others just as much as she is her own.

title: Jules and Jim
simple_desc: Decades of a love triangle concerning two friends and an impulsive woman.

title: The Purple Rose of Cairo
simple_desc: In 1935 New Jersey, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.

title: The Awful Truth
simple_desc: A married couple file an amicable divorce, but find it harder to let go of each other than they initially thought.

title: Joyeux Noel
simple_desc: In December 1914, an unofficial Christmas truce on the Western Front allows soldiers from opposing sides of the First World War to gain insight into each other's way of life.

title: The Lady Eve
simple_desc: A trio of classy card sharks targets a socially awkward brewery heir, until one of them falls in love with him.

title: Kapoor & Sons
simple_desc: The story about two brothers who visit their dysfunctional family for their grandfather's birthday party.

title: Dear Frankie
simple_desc: After having responded to her son's numerous letters in the guise of his father, a woman hires a stranger to pose as his dad when meeting him.

title: Magadheera
simple_desc: A warrior gets reincarnated 400 years later, after trying to save the princess and the kingdom, who also dies along with him. He then sets back again to fight against all odds and win back his love.

title: The Little Mermaid
simple_desc: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

title: Love Actually
simple_desc: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

title: Romeo and Juliet
simple_desc: When two young members of feuding families meet, forbidden love ensues.

title: West Side Story
simple_desc: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

title: A Star Is Born
simple_desc: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

title: Stardust
simple_desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

title: The Reader

simple_desc: Concurrent theatrical ending of the TV series Neon Genesis Evangelion (1995).

title: Rush

title: The Hustler

title: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story

title: The Fighter

title: The Blind Side

title: Shelter

title: I, Tonya

title: Waves

title: Coach Carter

title: Southpaw
simple_desc: After a fatal incident sends him on a rampant path of destruction, a champion boxer fights to get custody of his daughter and revive his professional career.

title: The Bad News Bears
simple_desc: An aging, down-on-his-luck ex-minor leaguer coaches a team of misfits in an ultra-competitive California little league.

title: Slap Shot
simple_desc: A failing ice hockey team finds success with outrageously violent hockey goonery.

title: Invictus
simple_desc: Nelson Mandela, in his first term as President of South Africa, initiates a unique venture to unite the Apartheid-torn land: enlist the national rugby team on a mission to win the 1995 Rugby World Cup.

title: Rocky II
simple_desc: Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.

title: Shaolin Soccer
simple_desc: A young Shaolin follower reunites with his discouraged brothers to form a soccer team using their martial art skills to their advantage.

title: Seabiscuit
simple_desc: True story of the undersized Depression-era racehorse whose victories lifted not only the spirits of the team behind it but also those of their nation.

title: Eddie the Eagle
simple_desc: The story of Eddie Edwards, the notoriously tenacious British underdog ski jumper who charmed the world at the 1988 Winter Olympics.

title: Cars
simple_desc: On the way to the biggest race of his life, a hotshot rookie race car gets stranded in a rundown town and learns that winning isn't everything in life.

title: Caddyshack
simple_desc: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

title: Unbroken
simple_desc: After a near-fatal plane crash in WWII, Olympian Louis Zamperini spends a harrowing 47 days in a raft with two fellow crewmen before he's caught by the Japanese navy and sent to a prisoner-of-war camp.

title: Major League
simple_desc: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians puts together a purposely horrible team so they'll lose and she can move the team. But when the plot is uncovered, they start winning just to spite her.

title: Friday Night Lights
simple_desc: Based on H.G. Bissinger's book, which profiled the economically depressed town of Odessa, Texas and their heroic high school football team, The Permian High Panthers.

title: Secretariat
simple_desc: Penny Chenery Tweedy and colleagues guide her long-shot but precocious stallion to set, in 1973, the unbeaten record for winning the Triple Crown.

title: Glory Road
simple_desc: In 1966, Texas Western coach Don Haskins led the first all-black starting line-up for a college basketball team to the NCAA national championship.

title: Love & Basketball
simple_desc: Monica and Quincy love and play basketball together through many life challenges from childhood to adulthood.

title: Peaceful Warrior
simple_desc: A chance encounter with a stranger changes the life of a college gymnast.

title: Eight Men Out
simple_desc: A dramatization of the Black Sox scandal when the underpaid Chicago White Sox accepted bribes to deliberately lose the 1919 World Series.

title: The Express
simple_desc: A drama based on the life of college football hero Ernie Davis, the first African-American to win the Heisman Trophy.

title: Creed II
simple_desc: Under the tutelage of Rocky Balboa, newly crowned heavyweight champion Adonis Creed faces off against Viktor Drago, the son of Ivan Drago.

title: Fighting with My Family
simple_desc: A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment.

title: Real Steel
simple_desc: In the near future, robot boxing is a top sport. A struggling ex-boxer feels he's found a champion in a discarded robot.

title: The Longest Yard
simple_desc: A sadistic warden asks a former pro quarterback, now serving time in his prison, to put together a team of inmates to take on (and get pummeled by) the guards.

title: Rocky Balboa
simple_desc: Thirty years after the ring of the first bell, Rocky Balboa comes out of retirement and dons his gloves for his final fight against the reigning heavyweight champ Mason 'The Line' Dixon.

title: Chariots of Fire
simple_desc: Two British track athletes, one a determined Jew and the other a devout Christian, are driven to win in the 1924 Olympics as they wrestle with issues of pride and conscience.

title: Lords of Dogtown
simple_desc: The film follows the surf and skateboarding trends that originated in Venice, California during the 1970s.

title: Concussion
simple_desc: In Pittsburgh, accomplished pathologist Dr. Bennet Omalu uncovers the truth about brain damage in football players who suffer repeated concussions in the course of normal play.

title: Race
simple_desc: Jesse Owens' quest to become the greatest track and field athlete in history thrusts him onto the world stage of the 1936 Olympics, where he faces off against Adolf Hitler's vision of Aryan supremacy.

title: Chasing Mavericks
simple_desc: When young Jay Moriarity discovers that the mythic Mavericks surf break, one of the biggest waves on Earth, exists just miles from his Santa Cruz home, he enlists the help of local legend Frosty Hesson to train him to survive it.

title: Gridiron Gang
simple_desc: Teenagers at a juvenile detention center, under the leadership of their counselor, gain self-esteem by playing football together.

title: Win Win
simple_desc: A struggling lawyer and volunteer wrestling coach's chicanery comes back to haunt him when the teenage grandson of the client he has double-crossed comes into his life.

title: Happy Gilmore
simple_desc: A rejected hockey player puts his skills to the golf course to save his grandmother's house.

title: The Color of Money
simple_desc: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.

title: Cool Runnings
simple_desc: When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified from the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.

title: Bull Durham
simple_desc: A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

title: Soul Surfer
simple_desc: Teenage surfer Bethany Hamilton overcomes the odds and her own fears of returning to the water after losing her left arm in a shark attack.

title: Foxcatcher
simple_desc: U.S. Olympic wrestling champions and brothers Mark Schultz and Dave Schultz join "Team Foxcatcher", led by eccentric multi-millionaire John du Pont, as they train for the 1988 Olympic Games in Seoul, South Korea, but John's self-destructive behavior threatens to consume them all.

title: Invincible
simple_desc: Based on the story of Vince Papale, a 30-year-old bartender from South Philadelphia who overcame long odds to play for the NFL's Philadelphia Eagles in 1976.

title: Pawn Sacrifice
simple_desc: Set during the Cold War, American chess prodigy Bobby Fischer finds himself caught between two superpowers and his own struggles as he challenges the Soviet Empire.

title: We Are Marshall
simple_desc: When a plane crash claims the lives of members of the Marshall University football team and some of its fans, the team's new coach and his surviving players try to keep the football program alive.

title: Sultan
simple_desc: Sultan is a classic underdog tale about a wrestler's journey, looking for a comeback by defeating all odds.

title: Million Dollar Arm
simple_desc: A sports agent stages an unconventional recruitment strategy to get talented Indian cricket players to play Major League Baseball.

title: The Boxer
simple_desc: Young Danny Flynn is released from prison 14 years after "taking the rap" for the IRA and tries to rebuild his life in his old Belfast neighborhood.

title: The Legend Is Born: Ip Man
simple_desc: Yip Man's resistance against invading foreigners, along with his romantic relations while under the tutelage of three Wing Chun masters.

title: Creed III
simple_desc: Adonis has been thriving in both his career and family life, but when a childhood friend and former boxing prodigy resurfaces, the face-off is more than just a fight.

title: The Rookie
simple_desc: A Texas baseball coach makes the major league after agreeing to try out if his high school team made the playoffs.

title: Rocky IV
simple_desc: Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-four, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union.

title: Kingpin
simple_desc: A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.

title: He Got Game
simple_desc: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

title: Whip It
simple_desc: In Bodeen, Texas, an indie-rock-loving misfit finds a way of dealing with small-town misery after discovering a roller-derby league in nearby Austin.

title: Radio
simple_desc: The story of a high school coach and the developmentally challenged man who he took under his wing.

title: Any Given Sunday
simple_desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.

title: The Cutting Edge
simple_desc: A temperamental figure skater and an arrogant former hockey player attempt to win the Olympic Gold Medal as a figure skating pairs team.

title: Heaven Can Wait
simple_desc: A Los Angeles Rams quarterback, accidentally taken away from his body by an overanxious angel before he was meant to die, returns to life in the body of a recently murdered millionaire.

title: Borg vs. McEnroe
simple_desc: The story of the 1980 tennis rivalry between the placid Björn Borg and the volatile John McEnroe.

title: White Men Can't Jump
simple_desc: Black and white basketball hustlers join forces to double their chances of winning money on the street courts and in a basketball tournament.

title: Bloodsport
simple_desc: "Bloodsport" follows Frank Dux, an American martial artist serving in the military, who decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.

title: Trouble with the Curve
simple_desc: A daughter tries to remedy her dysfunctional relationship with her ailing father, a decorated baseball scout, by helping him in a recruiting trip which could be his last.

title: Rocky III
simple_desc: Rocky faces the ultimate challenge from a powerful new contender, and must turn to a former rival to help regain his throne as the undisputed fighting champion.

title: Draft Day
simple_desc: At the NFL Draft, General Manager Sonny Weaver has the opportunity to rebuild his team when he trades for the number one pick. He must decide what he's willing to sacrifice on a life-changing day for a few hundred young men with NFL dreams.

title: Goon
simple_desc: Labeled an outcast by his brainy family, a bouncer overcomes long odds to lead a team of under performing misfits to semi-pro hockey glory, beating the crap out of everything that stands in his way.

title: The Football Factory
simple_desc: An insight on the gritty life of a bored male, Chelsea football hooligan who lives for violence, sex, drugs & alcohol.

title: A Prayer Before Dawn
simple_desc: The true story of an English boxer incarcerated in one of Thailand's most notorious prisons as he fights in Muay Thai tournaments to earn his freedom.

title: Bleed for This
simple_desc: The inspirational story of World Champion Boxer Vinny Pazienza who, after a near fatal car crash which left him not knowing if he'd ever walk again, made one of sports' most incredible comebacks.

title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
simple_desc: A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament in order to save their cherished local gym from the onslaught of a corporate health fitness chain.

title: Cars 3
simple_desc: Lightning McQueen sets out to prove to a new generation of racers that he's still the best race car in the world.

title: The Way Back
simple_desc: Jack Cunningham was a high school basketball phenom who walked away from the game, forfeiting his future. Years later, when he reluctantly accepts a coaching job at his alma mater, he may get one last shot at redemption.

title: Bend It Like Beckham
simple_desc: Two ambitious girls, despite their parents' wishes, have their hearts set on careers in professional football.

title: Hot Rod
simple_desc: Self-proclaimed stuntman Rod Kimble is preparing for the jump of his life - to clear fifteen buses to raise money for his abusive stepfather Frank's life-saving heart operation.

title: Surf's Up
simple_desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.

title: Ali
simple_desc: A biography of sports legend Muhammad Ali, focusing on his triumphs and controversies between 1964 and 1974.

title: Battle of the Sexes
simple_desc: The true story of the 1973 tennis match between World number one Billie Jean King and ex-champ and serial hustler Bobby Riggs.

title: Mystery, Alaska
simple_desc: The residents of a small town get over-excited when their hockey team gets chosen to host a televised event.

title: The Legend of Bagger Vance
simple_desc: A down-and-out golfer attempts to recover his game and his life with help from a mystical caddy.

title: Hidalgo
simple_desc: In 1890, a down-and-out cowboy and his horse travel to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross desert horse race.

title: Blood and Bone
simple_desc: In Los Angeles, an ex-con takes the underground fighting world by storm in his quest to fulfill a promise to a dead friend.

title: Goal! The Dream Begins
simple_desc: The extremely talented Santiago Muñez is spotted by a Newcastle United scout and given a chance at professional football.

title: Redbelt
simple_desc: A fateful event leads to a job in the film business for top mixed-martial arts instructor Mike Terry. Though he refuses to participate in prize bouts, circumstances conspire to force him to consider entering such a competition.

title: Resurrecting the Champ
simple_desc: Up-and-coming sports reporter rescues a homeless man ("Champ") only to discover that he is, in fact, a boxing legend believed to have passed away. What begins as an opportunity to resurrect Champ's story and escape the shadow of his father's success becomes a personal journey as the ambitious reporter reexamines his own life and his relationship with his family.

title: Bigil
simple_desc: A former football player struggles to train a women's football team and avenge his father's death.

title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
simple_desc: Number one NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby stays atop the heap thanks to a pact with his best friend and teammate, Cal Naughton, Jr. But when a French Formula One driver, makes his way up the ladder, Ricky Bobby's talent and devotion are put to the test.

title: The Replacements
simple_desc: During a pro football strike, the owners hire substitute players.

title: Back to School
simple_desc: To help his discouraged son get through college, a funloving and obnoxious rich businessman decides to enter the school as a student himself.

title: Heavyweights
simple_desc: Plump kids are lured into joining a posh fat camp with the promise of quick weight loss and good times, only to find that it is a woodland hellhole run by a psycho ex-fitness instructor.

title: Rollerball
simple_desc: In a corporate-controlled future, an ultra-violent sport known as Rollerball represents the world, and one of its powerful athletes is out to defy those who want him out of the game.

title: For Love of the Game
simple_desc: After 19 years of playing the game he's loved his whole life, Detroit Tigers pitcher Billy Chapel has to decide if he's going to risk everything and put everything out there.

title: Victory
simple_desc: As allied P.O.W.s prepare for a soccer game against the German National Team to be played in Nazi-occupied Paris, the French Resistance and British officers are making plans for the team's escape.

title: Varsity Blues
simple_desc: A back-up quarterback is chosen to lead a Texas football team to victory after the star quarterback is injured.

title: Space Jam
simple_desc: In a desperate attempt to win a basketball match and earn their freedom, the Looney Tunes seek the aid of retired basketball champion, Michael Jordan.

title: The Mighty Ducks
simple_desc: A self-centered Minnesota lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

title: Never Back Down
simple_desc: A frustrated and conflicted teenager arrives at a new high school to discover an underground fight club, and meets a classmate who begins to coerce him into fighting.

title: BASEketball
simple_desc: Two childhood friends are pro athletes of a national sport called BASEketball, a hybrid of baseball and basketball, and must deal with a greedy businessman scheming against their team.

title: Run Fatboy Run
simple_desc: Five years after jilting his pregnant fiancée on their wedding day, out-of-shape Dennis decides to run a marathon to win her back.

title: The Longest Yard
simple_desc: Prison inmates form a football team to challenge the prison guards.

title: 17 Again
simple_desc: Mike O'Donnell is ungrateful for how his life turned out. He gets a chance to rewrite his life when he tried to save a janitor near a bridge and jumped after him into a time vortex.

title: Turbo
simple_desc: A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream: winning the Indy 500.

title: Hardball
simple_desc: A gambling addict and ticket scalper living an aimless life reluctantly agrees to coach a Little League team from the Chicago projects as part of a loan agreement.

title: Kickboxer
simple_desc: Kurt Sloane must learn the ancient kick boxing art of Muay Thai in order to avenge his brother.

title: The Game Plan
simple_desc: An NFL quarterback living the bachelor lifestyle discovers that he has an 8-year-old daughter from a previous relationship.

title: Little Giants
simple_desc: Misfits form their own opposing team to an elite peewee football team, coached by the elite team coach's brother.

title: Tin Cup
simple_desc: A washed-up golf pro working at a driving range tries to qualify for the U.S. Open in order to win the heart of his successful rival's girlfriend.

title: Here Comes the Boom
simple_desc: A high-school biology teacher looks to become a successful mixed martial arts fighter in an effort to raise money to prevent extracurricular activities from being axed at his cash-strapped school.

title: Mean Machine
simple_desc: A football star jailed for assault leads a group of inmates in a match against prison guards.

title: Grudge Match
simple_desc: A pair of aging boxing rivals are coaxed out of retirement to fight one final bout, thirty years after their last match.

title: She's the Man
simple_desc: When her brother decides to ditch for a couple weeks, Viola heads over to his elite boarding school, disguised as him, and proceeds to fall for his school's star soccer player, and soon learns she's not the only one with romantic troubles.

title: Blades of Glory
simple_desc: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

title: Stick It
simple_desc: After a run-in with the law, Haley Graham (Missy Peregrym) is forced to return to the world from which she fled some years ago. Enrolled in an elite gymnastics program run by the legendary Burt Vickerman (Jeff Bridges), Haley's rebellious attitude gives way to something that just might be called team spirit.

title: Wimbledon
simple_desc: A pro tennis player has lost his ambition and has fallen in rank to 119. Fortunately for him, he meets a young player on the women's circuit who helps him recapture his focus for Wimbledon.

title: Cars 2
simple_desc: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.

title: The Karate Kid
simple_desc: Work causes a single mother to move to China with her young son; in his new home, the boy embraces kung fu, taught to him by a master.

title: The Cannonball Run
simple_desc: A wide variety of eccentric competitors participate in a wild and illegal cross-country road race. However, the eccentric entrants will do anything to win the road race, including low-down, dirty tricks.

title: Angels in the Outfield
simple_desc: When a boy prays for a chance to have a family if the California Angels win the pennant, angels are assigned to make that possible.

title: Death Race 2000
simple_desc: In a dystopian future, a cross country automobile race requires contestants to run down innocent pedestrians to gain points that are tallied based on each kill's brutality.

title: Lionheart
simple_desc: An Ex-French Soldier begins participating in underground street fights in order to make money for his brother's family.

title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk
simple_desc: 19-year-old Billy Lynn is brought home for a victory tour after a harrowing Iraq battle. Through flashbacks, the film shows what really happened to his squad - contrasting the realities of war with America's perceptions.

title: Fever Pitch
simple_desc: Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.

title: Two for the Money
simple_desc: After suffering a career-ending knee injury, a former college football star aligns himself with one of the most renowned touts in the sports-gambling business.

title: Chalet Girl
simple_desc: Former skateboard champion Kim wants to make more money after her mother's tragic death. She joins the elite posh servicing company, which sends her off to Austria.

title: Bring It On
simple_desc: A champion high school cheerleading squad discovers its previous captain stole all their best routines from an inner-city school and must scramble to compete at this year's championships.

title: The Waterboy
simple_desc: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

title: Rookie of the Year
simple_desc: When an accident miraculously gives a boy an incredibly powerful pitching arm, he becomes a major league pitcher for the Chicago Cubs.

title: Days of Thunder
simple_desc: A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

title: Speed Racer
simple_desc: Young driver Speed Racer aspires to be champion of the racing world with the help of his family and his high-tech Mach 5 automobile.

title: D2: The Mighty Ducks
simple_desc: Can Gordon's team win the Junior Goodwill Games in California in spite of all the set-backs?

title: The Karate Kid Part II
simple_desc: Daniel accompanies his mentor, Mr. Miyagi, to Miyagi's childhood home in Okinawa. Miyagi visits his dying father and confronts his old rival, while Daniel falls in love and inadvertently makes a new rival of his own.

title: Fired Up!
simple_desc: The two most popular guys in high school decide to ditch football camp for cheerleader camp. For the girls and for the glory.

title: Undisputed
simple_desc: When heavyweight champion George "Iceman" Chambers lands in prison, the resident gangster arranges a boxing match with the reigning prison champ.

title: Early Man
simple_desc: Set at the dawn of time, when prehistoric creatures and woolly mammoths roamed the earth, Early Man tells the story of Dug, along with sidekick Hognob as they unite his tribe against a mighty enemy Lord Nooth and his Bronze Age City to save their home.

title: Home Team
simple_desc: New Orleans Saints head coach Sean Payton coaches his son's 6th-grade football team while he is being suspended for the entire 2012 season as a result of his role in the Saints' Bountygate scandal.

title: Ice Princess
simple_desc: With the help of her coach, her mom, and the boy who drives the Zamboni machine, nothing can stop Casey (Trachtenberg) from realizing her dream to be a champion figure skater.

title: Leatherheads
simple_desc: In 1925, an enterprising pro football player convinces America's too-good-to-be-true college football hero to play for his team and keep the league from going under.

title: Vertical Limit
simple_desc: A climber must rescue his sister on top of K2, one of the world's biggest mountains.

title: The Fan
simple_desc: An all star baseball player becomes the unhealthy focus of a down on his luck salesman.

title: Lucky You
simple_desc: A hotshot poker player tries to win a tournament in Vegas, but is fighting a losing battle with his personal problems.

title: Nacho Libre
simple_desc: Berated all his life by those around him, a monk follows his dream and dons a mask to moonlight as a Luchador (Mexican wrestler).

title: Over the Top
simple_desc: Tough trucker Lincoln Hawk is determined to win back his son and triumph at the world arm wrestling championships.

title: The Ringer
simple_desc: A young guy's only option to erase a really bad debt is to rig the Special Olympics by posing as a contestant.

title: Semi-Pro
simple_desc: Jackie Moon, the owner-coach-player of the American Basketball Association's Flint Michigan Tropics, rallies his teammates to make their NBA dreams come true.

title: Bad News Bears
simple_desc: A grizzled little league coach tries to turn his team of misfits into champs.

title: Annapolis
simple_desc: Set against the backdrop of boxing at the Naval Academy, centers on a young man from the wrong side of the tracks whose dream of attending Annapolis becomes a reality.

title: Goal II: Living the Dream
simple_desc: When Newcastle United soccer star Santiago Muñez (Kuno Becker) is offered a spot with Real Madrid, he accepts, but the move - accompanied by big money and fame - tests his ties and loyalties to family, friends, and business acquaintances.

title: Blue Crush
simple_desc: As a hard-core surfer girl prepares for a big competition, she finds herself falling for a football player.

title: Planes
simple_desc: A cropdusting plane with a fear of heights lives his dream of competing in a famous around-the-world aerial race.

title: Playing for Keeps
simple_desc: A former sports star who's fallen on hard times starts coaching his son's football team as a way to get his life together. His attempts to become an adult are met with challenges from the attractive football moms who pursue him at every turn.

title: Kicking & Screaming
simple_desc: Family man Phil Weston, a lifelong victim of his father's competitive nature, takes on the coaching duties of a kids' soccer team, and soon finds that he's also taking on his father's dysfunctional way of relating.

title: Major League II
simple_desc: The Indians are now a World Series contender. But last year's hunger is now replaced with complacency, and bad decisions by the new owner threaten to tear the team apart.

title: The Benchwarmers
simple_desc: A trio of guys try and make up for missed opportunities in childhood by forming a three-player baseball team to compete against standard children's Little League squads.

title: Fighting
simple_desc: In New York City, a young counterfeiter is introduced to the world of underground street fighting by a seasoned scam artist, who becomes his manager on the bare-knuckling brawling circuit.

title: D3: The Mighty Ducks
simple_desc: The unruly team of hockey misfits grows up a bit and receives scholarships to a prestigious prep school, where they take on the snotty varsity team.

title: 3 Ninjas
simple_desc: Each year, three brothers visit their grandfather for the summer. He is highly skilled in ninjutsu, and for years he has trained the boys in his techniques.

title: Point Break
simple_desc: A young FBI agent infiltrates an extraordinary team of extreme sports athletes he suspects of masterminding a string of unprecedented, sophisticated corporate heists.

title: Rocky V
simple_desc: Reluctantly retired from fighting, Rocky takes charge of Mickey's gym and agrees to train a young protégé who's hungry for success.

title: The Karate Kid Part III
simple_desc: Ostracised villain John Kreese attempts to gain revenge on Daniel and Miyagi, with the help of a Vietnam War comrade, the wealthy owner of a toxic waste disposal business.

title: Like Mike
simple_desc: A 13-year-old orphan becomes an NBA superstar after trying on a pair of sneakers with the faded initials "MJ" inside them.

title: Balls of Fury
simple_desc: Down-and-out former professional ping-pong phenom, Randy Daytona, is sucked into a maelstrom when FBI Agent Ernie Rodriguez recruits him for a secret mission. Randy is determined to bounce back and win, and to smoke out his father's killer -- arch-fiend Feng.

title: Snow Dogs
simple_desc: When a Miami dentist inherits a team of sled dogs, he's got to learn the trade or lose his pack to a crusty mountain man.

title: Mr. Woodcock
simple_desc: Taken aback by his mother's wedding announcement, a young man returns home in an effort to stop her from marrying his old high school gym teacher, a man who made middle school hell for generations of students.

title: Tooth Fairy
simple_desc: A bad deed on the part of a tough minor-league hockey player results in an unusual sentence: He must serve one week as a real-life tooth fairy.

title: Herbie Fully Loaded
simple_desc: Maggie Peyton, the new owner of Herbie, Number 53, the free-wheelin' Volkswagen bug with a mind of its own, puts the car through its paces on the road to becoming a NASCAR competitor.

title: Driven
simple_desc: A young hot shot driver is in the middle of a championship season and is coming apart at the seams. A former CART champion is called in to give him guidance.

title: Space Jam: A New Legacy
simple_desc: A rogue artificial intelligence kidnaps the son of famed basketball player LeBron James, who then has to work with Bugs Bunny to win a basketball game.

title: The Next Karate Kid
simple_desc: Mr. Miyagi is back and he takes a new pupil under his wing: a troubled adolescent girl.

title: The Love Guru
simple_desc: Pitka, an American raised outside of his country by gurus, returns to the States in order to break into the self-help business. His first challenge is to settle the romantic troubles and subsequent professional skid of a star hockey player whose wife left him for a rival athlete.

title: Spy Kids 4: All the Time in the World
simple_desc: A retired spy is called back into action, and to bond with her new step-children, she invites them along for the adventure to stop the evil Timekeeper from taking over the world.

title: Rollerball
simple_desc: The big thing in 2005 is a violent sport which can have some pretty serious consequences... like dying.

title: Student of the Year 2
simple_desc: A student must face off against bullies and overcome hurdles, both academic and romantic, to win his college's coveted Student of the Year trophy.

title: The Dark Knight
simple_desc: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
simple_desc: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

title: Parasite
simple_desc: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: The Departed
simple_desc: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: Léon: The Professional
simple_desc: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

title: The Prestige
simple_desc: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

title: The Usual Suspects
simple_desc: The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

title: Psycho
simple_desc: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

title: Rear Window
simple_desc: A photographer in a wheelchair spies on his neighbors from his Greenwich Village courtyard apartment window, and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder, despite the skepticism of his fashion-model girlfriend.

title: Woman in the Dunes

title: 1: Nenokkadine

title: Angels with Dirty Faces
simple_desc: A priest tries to stop a gangster from corrupting a group of street kids.

A scientist invents a time machine, which leads to a bitter battle between his evil twin brother and his son.

title: The Batman
simple_desc: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
simple_desc: A journalist is aided by a young female hacker in his search for the killer of a woman who has been dead for forty years.

title: The Insider

simple_desc: A group of men set out in search of a dead body in the Anatolian steppes.

title: The Chaser
simple_desc: A disgraced ex-policeman who runs a small ring of prostitutes finds himself in a race against time when one of his women goes missing.

title: Ninja Scroll
simple_desc: A vagabond swordsman is aided by a kunoichi and a spy in battling a demonic clan of killers - led by a ghost from his past - who are bent on overthrowing the Tokugawa Shogunate.

title: The White Ribbon
simple_desc: Strange events happen in a small village in the north of Germany during the years before World War I, which seem to be ritual punishment. Who is responsible?

title: Frankenstein
simple_desc: Dr. Frankenstein dares to tamper with life and death by creating a human monster out of lifeless body parts.

title: Shadow of a Doubt
simple_desc: A teenage girl, overjoyed when her favorite uncle comes to visit the family in their quiet California town, slowly begins to suspect that he is in fact the "Merry Widow" killer sought by the authorities.

title: The Asphalt Jungle
simple_desc: A major heist goes off as planned, but then double crosses, bad luck and solid police work cause everything to unravel.

title: The Killer
simple_desc: A disillusioned assassin accepts one last hit in hopes of using his earnings to restore vision to a singer he accidentally blinded.

title: Badla
simple_desc: A dynamic young entrepreneur finds herself locked in a hotel room with the corpse of her dead lover. She hires a prestigious lawyer to defend her and they work together to figure out what actually happened.

title: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
simple_desc: In 1900, a young widow finds her seaside cottage is haunted and forms a unique relationship with the ghost.

title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
simple_desc: A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
simple_desc: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

title: Ex Machina
simple_desc: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.

title: Ocean's Eleven
simple_desc: Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

title: Wind River
simple_desc: A wildlife officer, who is haunted by a tragedy that happened because of him, teams up with an FBI agent in solving a murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation and hopes to get redemption from his past regrets.

title: The Count of Monte Cristo
simple_desc: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friend", escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.

title: Deliverance
simple_desc: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

title: Zodiac
simple_desc: Between 1968 and 1983, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

title: Primal Fear
simple_desc: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.

title: The Game
simple_desc: After a wealthy San Francisco banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down as he begins to question if it might really be a concealed conspiracy to destroy him.

title: Blue Velvet
simple_desc: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

title: A Few Good Men
simple_desc: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

title: Coraline
simple_desc: An adventurous 11-year-old girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

title: Training Day
simple_desc: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

title: Man on Fire
simple_desc: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

title: Argo
simple_desc: Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.

title: The Machinist
simple_desc: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
simple_desc: The story of 7 people on trial stemming from various charges surrounding the uprising at the 1968 Democratic National Convention in Chicago, Illinois.

title: The Bourne Supremacy
simple_desc: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

title: Crash
simple_desc: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

title: Halloween
simple_desc: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

title: First Blood
simple_desc: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

title: Gravity
simple_desc: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.

title: The Boondock Saints
simple_desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

title: Road to Perdition
simple_desc: A mob enforcer's son in 1930s Illinois witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

title: Dirty Harry
simple_desc: When a man calling himself "the Scorpio Killer" menaces San Francisco, tough-as-nails Police Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is assigned to track down the crazed psychopath.

title: Serpico
simple_desc: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

title: Goldfinger
simple_desc: While investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

title: The Name of the Rose
simple_desc: An intellectually nonconformist friar investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

title: The French Connection
simple_desc: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.

title: Lucky Number Slevin
simple_desc: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses. Under constant surveillance by Detective Brikowski and assassin Goodkat, he must get them before they get him.

title: Paprika
simple_desc: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.

title: Sorcerer
simple_desc: Four unfortunate men from different parts of the globe agree to risk their lives transporting gallons of nitroglycerin across dangerous Latin American jungle.

title: Run Lola Run
simple_desc: After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

title: Black Book
simple_desc: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance.

title: The Man from Nowhere
simple_desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.

title: Miller's Crossing
simple_desc: Tom Reagan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

title: The Vanishing
simple_desc: Rex and Saskia, a young couple in love, are on vacation. They stop at a busy service station and Saskia is abducted. After three years and no sign of Saskia, Rex begins receiving letters from the abductor.

title: Never Look Away
simple_desc: German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime.

title: Cape Fear
simple_desc: A lawyer's family is stalked by a man he once helped put in jail.
